title: Offer a "login as other" user to allow filling in application as team mate in development
body_html:
In order locally test the entire application process, a 2nd user (ie. a team mate) is needed.

This feature should allow the currently logged in user to be swapped with a selected user from the listing at users#index – only in development.
body_text:
In order locally test the entire application process, a 2nd user (ie. a team mate) is needed.
This feature should allow the currently logged in user to be swapped with a selected user from the listing at users#index – only in development.
body:
In order locally test the entire application process, a 2nd user (ie. a team mate) is needed.

This feature should allow the currently logged in user to be swapped with a selected user from the listing at `users#index` – only in development.
